results.title: Rhabdomyolysis in a patient receiving high-dose simvastatin after the induction of therapeutic hypothermia.
results.text_hl: He was placed on a therapeutic @<m>DISEASE_Hypothermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@ protocol and his @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ dose was increased from 40 to 80 mg at bedtime.

citations.NLM: Dearing N, Norgard NB. Rhabdomyolysis in a patient receiving high-dose simvastatin after the induction of therapeutic hypothermia. Ann Pharmacother. 2010 Dec;44(12):1994-7. PMID: 21045169
citations.BibTeX: @article{21045169, title={Rhabdomyolysis in a patient receiving high-dose simvastatin after the induction of therapeutic hypothermia.}, author={Dearing N and Norgard NB}, journal={Ann Pharmacother}, volume={44}, number={12}, pages={1994-7}}

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates leukocyte recruitment in experimental bacterial meningitis.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>DISEASE_Hypothermia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@ was completely abolished in the 40 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Winkler F, Angele B, Pfister HW, Koedel U. Simvastatin attenuates leukocyte recruitment in experimental bacterial meningitis. Int Immunopharmacol. 2009 Mar;9(3):371-4. PMID: 19130904
citations.BibTeX: @article{19130904, title={Simvastatin attenuates leukocyte recruitment in experimental bacterial meningitis.}, author={Winkler F and Angele B and Pfister HW and Koedel U}, journal={Int Immunopharmacol}, volume={9}, number={3}, pages={371-4}}
